channel.title: life on Ghotfall's Corner
channel.description: Recent content in life on Ghotfall's Corner

item.title: About
item.description: Introduction Hello, everybody! My name is Andrii, but most people here know me as Ghotfall. The main purpose of this blog is to share interesting stories about my life, work and hobbies! Skills Skill Progress AWS Google Cloud Docker Kubernetes Terraform Service Mesh (AWS App Mesh, Maesh) GitOps (Flux CD) GitLab CI/CD GitHub Action AWS CodeCommit + CodeBuild + CodeDeploy + CodePipeline Bash & PowerShell Go Java Kotlin C++ Selenium A little bit about myself I am a student from Ukraine, I live in Vinnitsa now.
